    • Method Detail

      • addInventory

        public void addInventory(String name,
                         InventoryBuilder builder)
        Adds a custom inventory to the collection.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the inventory.
        builder - The InventoryBuilder instance representing the custom inventory.

      • removeInventory

        public void removeInventory(String name)
        Removes a custom inventory from the collection.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the inventory to be removed.

      • getInventoryBuilder

        public InventoryBuilder getInventoryBuilder(String name)
        Obtains the InventoryBuilder instance for the given inventory name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the inventory to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The InventoryBuilder instance associated with the given name, or null if the inventory with the specified name is not found.

      • isAdded

        public boolean isAdded(String name)
        Checks if an inventory with the given name has been added to the collection.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the inventory to check for.
        Returns:
        True if the inventory is present in the collection, false otherwise.

      • clearAllInventories

        public void clearAllInventories()
        Clears all inventories from the collection.
